About Me

Some more or less interesting things about me...

BIO

Hi. My name is Frederik Diekmann and my passion is coding. I love programming and enjoy learning new things everyday.

Together with two friends of mine I co-founded CDL Media, where we help doctors and business with services like livestreaming, video consultation hours, web development and more.

We're very active in the global web development / programming community aswell. Through Code Student, we hope to provide value to all kinds of developers from all over the world.

Also, I am a student for Business Informatics at the University of Mannheim.

  • PHP, SQL, Wordpress
